description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts which specify actions to be taken with respect to the specimens that accompany or precede an order. The purpose of these are to further qualify (when appropriate) the general action indicated by the order control code (code system xxxx). Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the OBR segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0065 (Specimen Action Code, version 2.1)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

display.value: Add ordered tests to the existing specimen

definition.value: Add ordered tests to the existing specimen

display.value: Cancel order for battery or tests named

definition.value: Cancel order for battery or tests named

display.value: Lab to obtain specimen from patient.

definition.value: Lab to obtain specimen from patient.

display.value: Specimen obtained by service other than Lab

definition.value: Specimen obtained by service other than Lab

display.value: Pending specimen-Order sent prior to delivery
